data.convo: Does this bus really go to the mall ? It goes all the way there . Are you sure ? I know it does . I catch this bus a lot . How long does it take for the bus to get there ? The bus ride is only thirty minutes or so . Where do we get off the bus ? Right behind Macy's is a bus stop . The stop is really at the mall ? It's in the middle of the parking lot . That's perfect . I know it is .
